name: NetcastsOSS
description: Simple podcasts (netcasts) management powered by open source software

scripts.clean: docker run --rm -it --privileged --volume=$PWD:/opt/workspace flutter-dev flutter clean; rm -f .packages
scripts.release: npm run clean; docker run --rm -it --privileged --volume=$PWD:/opt/workspace flutter-dev flutter build appbundle
scripts.start:docker: npm run clean; docker run --rm -it --privileged --volume=$PWD:/opt/workspace flutter-dev flutter run

author: Mihir Patel
